heading: HR00661
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY ON THE WARNING MADE BY THE PHILIPPINE OVERSEAS EMPLOYMENT ADMINISTRATION (POEA) ON FAKE JOBS BEING OFFERED THROUGH E-MAIL AND SOCIAL MEDIA AND OFFER AN ACTION PLAN IN ORDER TO PUT AN END TO THIS NEFARIOUS SCHEME
status: Pending with the Committee on OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS since 2017-01-24
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00661
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY ON THE WARNING MADE BY THE PHILIPPINE OVERSEAS EMPLOYMENT ADMINISTRATION (POEA) ON FAKE JOBS BEING OFFERED THROUGH E-MAIL AND SOCIAL MEDIA AND OFFER AN ACTION PLAN IN ORDER TO PUT AN END TO THIS NEFARIOUS SCHEME
